Privacy Policy

Deerpath Custom Builders, LLC

Effective Date: July 30, 2025

Last Updated: July 30, 2025

Deerpath Custom Builders, LLC (“we,” “our,” or “us”) values your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect information when you visit our website, www.deerpathcustombuilders.com.

1. Information We Collect

Personal Information You Provide: Name, email address, phone number, and project details you choose to share.

Automatically Collected Information: IP address, browser type, device information, pages visited, and referring website.

2. How We Use Your Information

  • Respond to inquiries and provide quotes
  • Manage and schedule projects
  • Improve our website and services
  • Send updates or newsletters (if opted in)
  • Comply with legal obligations

3. Sharing of Information

We may share information with trusted service providers, legal authorities when required, or in connection with a business transfer. We do not sell or rent personal information.

4. Cookies and Tracking

Our site may use cookies and analytics tools to improve functionality. You can disable cookies in your browser settings.

5. Data Security

We use industry-standard security measures, but no internet transmission is 100% secure.

6. Your Privacy Choices

You may opt out of promotional emails or request changes to your data by contacting us at info@deerpathcustombuilders.com.

7. Children’s Privacy

Our services are not directed to children under 13. We do not knowingly collect their data.

8. Links to Other Websites

We are not responsible for privacy practices of linked third-party websites.

9. Changes to This Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. Changes will be posted with a revised date.
